title: does eee require a lot of math?

comments.body: You're asking like, " can I drive my car without the engine and wheels? "
You do realise that you are pursuing engineering right? There will be math in all branches, more so in circuital ones.

Yep me being an eee student 3rd sem you do need math
4th sem you require a lot of math in power electronics n control systems 
In generally engineering does require math more in electronics n electrical ig
what if i sexually identify as a car
